text: The Citroen C5 X is a mid-size crossover SUV made by Citroën since 2021. == History and Features == The name was previously used in the C5 the X in the name means crossover it was launched in 2022 the C5 X is a crossover SUV but it has a Station wagon design. the car has a 1.2 and a 1.6 turbo gasoline engines it has a Plug-in hybrid (PHEV) version with 4 driving modes called Electric, Hybrid, Comfort and Sport. == Markets == The Citroen C5 X is currently sold mainly in Europe but it was sold in Australia and is sold in China as the Citroen Versallies C5 X. == References == Category:Citroën automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Citroën C5 X
